message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I think would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $18000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay up to $12000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I understand you're looking for a good deal, $12000 doesn't quite cover the value of this product to me.  I'm willing to come down to $15000. Would you be interested in that?
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $13500 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
